00027 class UTCTime {
00028 public:
00035   UTCTime(const std::string& val): value(val) {
00036     if (value.size() != 20) {
00037       throw UTCTimeException();
00038     }
00039     char* vv = (char*)(value.data());
00040     if ((vv[4] != '-') || (vv[7] != '-') || (vv[10] != 'T') || (vv[13] != ':') ||
00041         (vv[16] != ':') || (vv[19] != 'Z')) {
00042       throw UTCTimeException();
00043     }
00044   }
00045

00051   }

00061   }
